data.title: Oregon Department of Transportation : Available DMV Records & Fees : Oregon Driver & Motor Vehicle Services : State of Oregon
data.meta_description: Information on records available to qualifying people
data.text:
3-Year Non-Employment Driving Record (Certified)

This includes:

Oregon accidents;

Diversion agreements; and

Convictions not in the employment driving record.

The record may have some commercial entries.

Fee: $1.50 (Even if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Open-Ended Non-Employment Driving Record (Certified)

This record is only to be used by insurers and insurance support organizations for the purposes of offering an insurance discount to an individual. An individual may request his or her own insurance abstract to obtain an insurance discount under ORS 746.265(3).

This includes:

Oregon accidents;

Diversion agreements; and

Convictions not in the employment driving record.

The record may have some commercial entries.

Fee: $1.50 (Even if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

3-Year Employment Driving Record (Certified)

This includes Oregon job-related:

Convictions;

Accidents; and

CDL entries.

The record may have some commercial entries.

Fee: $2 ($1.50 if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Certified Court Print

This includes:

For Ten Years:

Convictions for major traffic offenses;

Commercial driver license entries;

Diversion agreements; and

Alcohol rehab entries.

For Five Years:

Convictions for minor offenses;

Accidents;

Suspensions;

Cancellations; and

Revocations.

The record may have some out-of-state commercial entries.

Fee: $3 ($1.50 if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Certified Court Print with CDL Medical Certification

This has the same information as a certified court print but also has CDL medical qualifications.

Fee: $3 ($1.50 if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Suspension Package

The package includes certified copies of suspension documents on a court proceeding, including a certified court print.

We will charge $11.50 even if there isn’t a suspension on the record. A certified court print will be provided along with a letter advising that the individual’s driving privilege was not suspended on the incident date provided.

Fee: $11.50 ($1.50 if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Driver License Information

This includes:

Name;

Address;

License number;

Date of birth;

License type;

Issue and expiration dates;

Restrictions; and

Endorsements.

Fee: $1.50 (Information provided on a certified print. $1.50 will be charged even if record cannot be found.)

Fee: $1.50 (Information provided by phone. This option is only available to DMV Record Inquiry Account holders.)

Fee: $.25 (Information provided online. This option is only available to DMV Record Inquiry Account holders. $.10 will be charged even if record cannot be found.)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Oregon Traffic Accident and Insurance Information

Copies of Accident Reports are not available. However, we can provide a certified letter with the following information to a person involved in the accident or the person’s family or representative:

Identity of the owner, driver, & occupants

Vehicle registration number

Insurance information

The names of witnesses.

A free Certificate of Filing is available to people who file an accident report with DMV.

Fee: $12.50 (Even if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Police Traffic Crash Report

This is a copy of the police report on the accident.

Fee: $8.50 (Even if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Driver License/ID Card Application History

This includes details of all original, renewal or replacement driver license or ID card transactions. This information may be provided in a certified letter format if the transaction was submitted electronically or copies of applications may be provided if available.

Fee: $17.50 ($1.50 if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Miscellaneous Driver Document

A specific document including:

Driving record; or

Non-restricted accident information.

Fee: $4

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Purged Information

This includes entries purged from the driving record.

Fee: $1.50 (Even if record cannot be found)

Vehicle Record Print

This includes:

Vehicle description;

Registered and security owner information; and

Other related information.

Fee: $4 ($2.50 if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Vehicle Record Information (via phone or online)

Only available to DMV Record Inquiry Account Holders

This includes:

Vehicle description;

Registered and security owner information; and

Other related information.

Fee: $2.50 (Information provided by phone.)

Fee: $.35 (Information viewed online. $.10 will be charged when no record can be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Previous Owner Information

This includes a certified letter containing details of the last title transaction, including previous owner information.

Fee: $14

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Vehicle Title History

This includes a certified letter containing details of all title transactions, including all prior owners, dating back to when the vehicle was first titled in Oregon or to the extent DMV has kept such records.

Fee: $22.50

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Insurance Information Search

This includes a certified letter containing the insurance company name and policy number specific to a vehicle or a person.

Fee: $10 (Even if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Miscellaneous Vehicle Document

Document related to motor vehicle business or information in the vehicle purge file.

Fee: $4

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Odometer History Search

This includes a certified letter containing all previous odometer readings provided to DMV on or after January 1, 1986.

Fee: $25 (Even if record cannot be found)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Certification

Request to certify any document that isn’t already certified.

Fee: $1
